titleStmt.title: Reflections upon several passages in a book entitled, The reasonableness of a personal reformation, and the necessity of conversion with a letter to Mr. John Galpine, concerning his printed encomium of J.F.
titleStmt.author: Elys, Edmund, ca. 1634-ca. 1707.
Galpine, John.

notesStmt.note: Place of imprint suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: tightly bound with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
